snippet.textDisplay: Just basing this on the trailer but the dialogue writing and VO delivery seems a lot more cheeseball than I remember on PS1. Maybe it was always that way and just more forgivable with the old cartoony visuals and feels out of place here but I'm hoping for a BETTER re-telling of the story, matured with age... not a dorky edgelord anime kid version. Hope it turns out ok.
snippet.textOriginal: Just basing this on the trailer but the dialogue writing and VO delivery seems a lot more cheeseball than I remember on PS1. Maybe it was always that way and just more forgivable with the old cartoony visuals and feels out of place here but I'm hoping for a BETTER re-telling of the story, matured with age... not a dorky edgelord anime kid version. Hope it turns out ok.

Well they're definitely changing the story. Why is Midgar surrounded by shadow creatures?

I can see the mechanic need to do this - a locked door doesn't make a whole ton of sense for the next games, but like, this is a big change. I'm far more curious to play now.
